privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.dataControllerText: This family directory is operated by the SBM Montessori School community. For data protection inquiries, please contact the school administration.
privacy.dataWeCollectText: We collect and process the following personal data:
privacy.dataWeCollectItem5: Email addresses and WhatsApp numbers (optional, for networking purposes)
privacy.dataWeCollectItem6: Contact sharing preferences and consent settings
privacy.legalBasisText: We process your data based on your explicit consent (Article 6(1)(a) GDPR) and for the legitimate interests of facilitating community connections within our school (Article 6(1)(f) GDPR).
privacy.howWeUseItem1: Display family information in the community directory
privacy.howWeUseItem2: Enable families to connect with each other
privacy.howWeUseItem3: Facilitate professional networking within the community
privacy.howWeUseItem4: Provide contact information sharing for networking (only when explicitly consented)
privacy.howWeUseItem5: Translate content between English and Spanish for accessibility
privacy.howWeUseItem6: Organize families by children's class assignments
privacy.dataSharingText: Your data is shared in the following ways:
privacy.dataSharingItem1: Family directory information is visible to all members of the SBM Montessori School community
privacy.dataSharingItem2: Contact information (email/WhatsApp) is only shared when you explicitly opt-in and other families choose to view it
privacy.dataSharingItem3: We do not sell, rent, or share your data with third parties outside our community
privacy.translationServicesText: We use DeepL's translation service to automatically translate family information between English and Spanish:
privacy.translationServicesItem1: Your submitted text is sent to DeepL's secure API for translation
privacy.translationServicesItem2: DeepL processes the data according to their privacy policy and GDPR compliance
privacy.translationServicesItem3: Both original and translated versions are stored in our database
privacy.translationServicesItem4: Translation helps make our directory accessible to Spanish and English-speaking families
privacy.translationServicesItem5: You can review DeepL's privacy policy at: https://www.deepl.com/privacy
privacy.contactInfoSharingText: Contact information sharing operates on a double opt-in system:
privacy.contactInfoSharingItem1: You must opt-in to allow your contact information to be visible for networking
privacy.contactInfoSharingItem2: Other families must actively choose to view contact information by clicking "Show Contact Information"
privacy.contactInfoSharingItem3: This ensures contact sharing only happens when both parties explicitly consent
privacy.contactInfoSharingItem4: You can change your contact sharing preferences at any time
privacy.yourRightsText: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy.yourRightsItem1: Right to Access: Request a copy of your personal data
privacy.yourRightsItem2: Right to Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
privacy.yourRightsItem3: Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your data
privacy.yourRightsItem4: Right to Restrict Processing: Limit how we use your data
privacy.yourRightsItem5: Right to Data Portability: Receive your data in a structured format
privacy.yourRightsItem6: Right to Object: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
privacy.yourRightsItem7: Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent at any time
privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain your data while your family is part of the SBM Montessori School community. Data will be deleted within 30 days of your request or when you are no longer part of the community.
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data, including encryption, secure hosting, and access controls.
privacy.childrenDataText: We only process children's data (names, photos, class information) with explicit parental consent. Parents can request deletion of their children's data at any time.
privacy.contactText1: To exercise your rights or for any privacy concerns, please contact the school administration.
privacy.contactText2: You have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority if you believe your data rights have been violated.
privacy.updateInfo: Need to update or delete your information?

gdpr.title: Privacy & Data Processing Notice
gdpr.description: We process personal data including names, photos, and professional information to operate this family directory. By using this service, you consent to data processing according to our privacy policy. You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data at any time.
